text: 11.8: Ru 18.1; 18.5Gu guigira nde nzuai, mba phena namkam khavgirga, ana mba ana kɨvntok vuzvugi bigi, ana zam ntan anan nɨɨŋgirga. Ana khueŋ ndɨkndɨga mba bigin ana ndɨɨi fhuvara, ‘Ana nan kɨvntok ma.’ Fhuvara. Ana khaŋ muuŋgi ne nzuav, ana kɨvntok pim mba bigin ana nzaim, ana maaŋ muuŋgiap mba ana kɨvntok ana nzai bigi, ana zam ntan anan nɨɨŋgirga.
